text: Big Time Rush, (also known as BTR), is a television series that airs on the Nickelodeon network. It is about four Minnesota teenagers, played by Kendall Schmidt, James Maslow, Carlos Pena, Jr. and Logan Henderson, who form a boy band and move to Hollywood, California. Ciara Bravo, Tanya Chisholm, and Stephen Kramer Glickman co-star. As of May 12, 2012, the show has aired fifty episodes over three seasons, from 2009 to 2012. == Series overview == Season Episodes Originally aired Originally aired DVD release DVD release Season premiere Season finale Volume 1 Volume 2 1 20 2 29 style="text-align: center; top" style="text-align: center; top" Film style="text-align: center; top" style="text-align: center; top" 3 20 style="text-align: center; top" style="text-algin: center; top" style="text-align: center; top" ==References== Category:Lists of television series episodes Episodes
